show_name: Super Dimensional Fortress Macross II: The Movie (OAV)
other_title: Chōjikū Yōsai Macross II - Lovers Again (Japanese)
Super Dimensional Fortress Macross II: La película (Spanish)
The Super Dimension Fortress Macross II: Lovers, Again
超時空要塞マクロスII Lovers Again (Japanese)
plot: A.D. 2089 - 80 years have passed since Space War I changed the lives of both human and Zentraedi races. Both races are at peace on Earth when a new alien race called the "Marduk" appear within the Solar System. While covering the first battle between the U.N. Spacy and the Marduk fleet, SNN rookie reporter Hibiki Kanzaki discovers Ishtar, an "Emulator" that enhances the Marduk's combat abilities through singing. Hibiki brings Ishtar to Earth to teach her the values of life and culture. Together with ace Valkyrie pilot Silvie Gena, Hibiki and Ishtar must find a way to save Earth from total destruction at the hands of the Marduk leader Ingues.
opening_theme: "2 Oku nen mae no Youni Shizukadane" (2億年前のように静かだね; The Hush of 200 Million Years) by Mika Kaneko
ending_theme: "Deja Vu ~ Sobai ite" (de・ja・vu～そばにいて; Deja Vu ~ Please Come Back To Me) by Mika Kaneko (eps 1-5)
insert_song: "Koi no Banana Moon" (恋のバナナムーン; Banana Moon in Love) by Yuka Satou (ep 1)
"Mou Ichido Love You" (もういちど Love you; Love You Once More) by Hiroko Kasahara (ep 6)
